segments.text: hey , Lucas , how was your trip to Paris ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: it was wonderful , but I was so tired .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: did you go to the top of the Eiffel Tower ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: yes , that was the first thing we did . We went all the way to the top . There were visitors from all over the world taking photos there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: art galleries , cathedrals , statues , fountains , palaces , bistros , there's really too much to say .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: you must have had a great time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: yes , at the beginning we were all excited and had lots of fun . However , on the third day of traveling in the city , I felt sick . I think I had something bad to eat , but it passed by the evening .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: yes , you need to be careful with what you eat when you're abroad . Sometimes new food might disagree with you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: on the fouth day , we went to taste the French cuisine . That was really fantastic ! And no stomach problems .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: that is great . Everyone says French food is wonderful .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: you'll have to try for yourself some day .
segments.speaker: S2
